DOC.brief_summary: A single dose , open label study characterize route elimination determine mass balance MK-0941 . A single 40 mg dose MK-0941 give orally male participant type 2 diabetes . After drug administration , blood , urine , fecal sample collect determine relative quantity 14C-labeled MK-0941 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Absorption , Metabolism , Excretion Mass Balance After Single Dose Administration MK-0941 ( MK-0941-016 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Subject diagnose type 2 diabetes , treat diet exercise oral antihyperglycemic agent Subject willing follow American Heart Association diet exercise program throughout study Subject nonsmoker and/or use nicotine product least 6 month Subject history stroke , seizure , major neurological disorder Subject history neoplastic disease Subject recently abnormal bowel habit , diarrhea , loose stool constipation Subject history type 1 diabetes mellitus Subject receive insulin within past 12 week Subject recent history eye infection Subject diagnose glaucoma blind Subject consume 3 alcoholic beverage per day Subject consume 6 serving coffee , tea , cola per day Subject major surgery , donate lose blood past 4 week Subject multiple severe allergy food drug
